content: Okay guys, Christmas aa raha hai! Decorations ka kya plan hai?
Meera, last year wale lights toh hain. Kuch naya try karein?
Haan, this time handmade ornaments banate hain. Aur sweets mein kya distribute karein?
Gujiya toh must hai! Aur maybe kuch cookies bhi?
Perfect! Gujiya aur cookies done. Decorations ka material kab layenge?
Kal shaam ko chalte hain, Meera. Sab kuch le aayenge!
Hey! Work-life balance in a relationship, tricky hai na? First, set clear boundaries. No work talk after 9 pm, agreed?
Agreed! But what if there's a deadline? Yaar, office toh office hai.
Okay, emergencies happen. But make it an exception, not the rule. Compensate with extra quality time later, promise?
That sounds fair. Aur kuch tips? I'm all ears, boss!
Schedule date nights like meetings! Treat them seriously. Phone calls aside, just us time. Samajh aaya?
Haan, date nights are important. Noted! Thanks, Rohit, these are actually helpful. Cheers!
Socho, family ke liye healthy meals kaise plan karein? I'm thinking more veggies and less junk.
Haan, that's a good idea. Maybe we can start with adding more fruits to breakfast?
Perfect! Aur lunch mein, let's try to pack more homemade food instead of relying on outside options.
Agreed. What about dinner? Maybe some light soups and salads?
Bilkul! And we can also try to incorporate millets into our diet. They're super healthy, you know?
Sounds like a plan! Let's make a list of healthy recipes and stick to it.
Beta's grades are slipping. I think I need to schedule a parent-teacher meeting. Kya bolti hai?
Yeah, Mom, that's probably a good idea. I've been struggling a bit in maths lately.
Okay, I'll email the teacher tomorrow. Any specific concerns I should mention besides maths, or sab theek hai?
Nah, just maths. Everything else is manageable, I think. Thanks, Mom.
Cool. I'll ask for a time that works for both of us. Maybe we can grab some chai after, kya kehti ho?
Sounds good, Mom! Thanks for helping me out with this. I appreciate it.
Baby, I'm thinking of a surprise weekend getaway. Kya kehte ho?
That sounds amazing! Where are you thinking of going?
I was thinking maybe a cozy hill station? Somewhere with good views and chai.
Ooh, I love that! When were you planning on going?
Next weekend? I'll handle everything, just pack a bag, okay?
Deal! You're the best, Ananya. I'm so excited!
Yaar, anniversary aa rahi hai, kya gift doon? I'm totally blank.
Hmm, depends on what she likes! Jewellery? Experience gift? Kuch personalized?
Jewellery toh hai kaafi. Experience... like kya? Aur personalized mein kya karoon?
Experience mein, maybe a hot air balloon ride? Ya personalized mein, a photo album of your memories?
Photo album is a good idea! I'm a photographer, after all. Hot air balloon... thoda risky lag raha hai.
Haha, fair enough! Then go with the photo album. Add some handwritten notes too, romantic lagega!
Okay guys, Ganesh Chaturthi is around the corner! Decorations ka kya plan hai?
Hum traditional rangoli banate hain, aur maybe kuch fairy lights bhi laga denge?
Sounds good! Aur sweets? Modak toh must hai, aur kya banaye?
Laddu aur barfi bhi bana sakte hain. Enough variety rahegi.
Perfect! Distribution ka kya scene hai? Who all are we sending sweets to?
Neighbors, close friends, and family. List bana lete hain.
Hey! Soch raha tha, coffee aur book date ke liye kaha chalein? Any ideas?
Hmm, that sounds lovely! What kind of vibe are you going for?
Something cozy, yaar. Jaha shor kam ho aur books bhi mil jayein. Maybe a bookstore cafe?
Oh, I know just the place! 'The Book Nook' in Hauz Khas Village. It's super chill.
The Book Nook? Sounds perfect! Coffee bhi achi milti hai waha?
Yeah, their coffee is great! And they have amazing pastries too. It's a win-win!
Yaar, communication is key! Suno, bina judge kare, listen karo. It's super important.
Haan, but sometimes I feel like I'm talking to a wall, Kavya. Koi response hi nahi!
Okay, try 'I feel' statements. Like, 'I feel ignored when...' Samajh rahi ho?
Hmm, that makes sense. Instead of blaming, focus on my feelings. I'll try that.
Exactly! And set aside dedicated time to talk, phone nahi, TV nahi. Just you two.
Okay, Kavya, thanks! I'll try these tips. Hopefully, things will improve. Fingers crossed!
Yaar, date night ke liye movie decide karein? I was thinking something light.
Haan, light toh theek hai. Koi rom-com ya phir action comedy?
Rom-com is good! 'Anyone But You' dekhi hai? Heard it's hilarious.
Oh, I've seen the trailers! Looks fun. Chalo, 'Anyone But You' final?
Perfect! 'Anyone But You' it is. Ab time aur theatre decide karte hain.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited, Arjun. See you soon!
Hey! Have you seen any good movies lately? I'm so behind!
Hey Riya! Yeah, I just watched 'Jawan'. SRK is fire!
Oh, 'Jawan'! I've heard it's amazing. Is it worth the hype, bilkul paisa vasool?
Totally! Action, drama, dialogues... sab kuch hai. You'll love it, pakka.
Awesome, I'll add it to my list. Any other recommendations, ya phir bas yahi?
Hmm, 'OMG 2' was also good, if you like social message wali films. Otherwise, 'Jawan' is the best bet!
Hey! Coffee date this weekend? I was thinking Blossoms Book House. It's super cozy!
Blossoms? Sounds perfect! I love that place. Good coffee too, right?
Yeah! And we can browse books after. I'm dying to find something new to read. Koi recommendation?
Hmm, I just finished 'Sapiens'. It's a bit heavy, but totally mind-blowing. Or something lighter?
Sapiens sounds interesting! Maybe I'll check it out. Saturday afternoon, then? Around 3?
Perfect! Saturday at 3 at Blossoms it is. Looking forward to it, Sneha!
Guys, check out this meme! *sends image of a cat trying to lift a dumbbell* Gym life is tough, yaar!
Haha, true that Deepak! *sends laughing emoji* But we gotta keep going, right?
Exactly! *sends image of a motivational quote* Never skip leg day, doston!
*sends image of a person struggling to walk after leg day* This is so me after leg day! Pain is gain, I guess.
Bilkul sahi! *sends flexing biceps emoji* Feel the burn, mere bhai!
Okay, okay, Mr. Motivation! *sends clapping emoji* I'm hitting the gym now. Thanks for the boost!
Beta, college applications are around the corner! Have you thought about what you want to major in? Koi idea hai?
Mom, I'm still confused! Everyone's pushing me towards engineering, but I'm not sure.
Engineering is great, but it's not for everyone. What subjects do you actually enjoy? Kis cheez mein interest hai?
I really like history and writing. Maybe something in the humanities?
That's fantastic! Let's explore those options. We can look at different career paths with a humanities degree. Kya kehte ho?
Okay, Mom. That sounds much better than just blindly following the crowd. Thanks!
Anniversary aa rahi hai, kya gift dein? He's not into the usual stuff, yaar.
Hmm, since he's a gamer, maybe a new gaming headset or a cool controller?
He has those already! I was thinking something more… personal. Koi sentimental cheez.
A custom-made gaming-themed portrait? Or a framed print of his favorite game character?
That's a good idea! Ya phir, maybe a weekend getaway to a gaming convention?
Woah, that's awesome! He'd love that! Book kar le, jaldi se!
Yaar, I'm so nervous! First date at a rooftop restaurant. What do I even wear? Kuch samajh nahi aa raha.
Rooftop? Nice! Something chic but comfy. Maybe a flowy dress? Or a stylish top with wide-leg pants?
Hmm, dress sounds good. But which one? I have this black midi dress, but is that too basic? Ya phir something brighter?
Black is always classy! Accessorize it with some statement jewelry and heels. Thoda sa 'oomph' factor add karo!
Okay, black midi it is! Heels are a must, right? I was thinking wedges, but maybe that's too casual?
Heels definitely! Wedges might be too relaxed. Go for some elegant heels, and you'll look amazing. All the best, Riya!
Hey! I'm thinking of a coffee-and-book date. Any recommendations for a cozy bookstore?
Oh, that sounds lovely! Have you tried 'The Book Nook'? It's super cozy.
The Book Nook, huh? Never heard of it. What's so special about it, yaar?
It has comfy armchairs, a fireplace, and a great coffee selection. Perfect for reading!
Sounds perfect! Do they have a good selection of books too? I need something interesting.
Definitely! They have everything from classics to new releases. You'll find something, pakka!
Yaar, Rakhi is coming up! What are you planning to wear? I'm so confused!
Oh, Rakhi! I was thinking maybe a simple kurta. What about you? Any gift ideas?
Kurta sounds comfy! I was thinking saree, but too much? As for gifts, I'm blank. Bhai ko kya doon?
Saree is great if you're up for it! Bhai ke liye, maybe a nice watch or wallet?
Hmm, watch is a good idea! Or maybe something personalized? What are you gifting your brother?
I'm thinking of getting him a gadget he's been eyeing. Personalised is always special though!
Hey! Movie night next week? Kya dekhe? I'm thinking something fun.
Hey! Haan, movie toh pakka. How about that new action flick, 'Fighter'? Heard it's good.
Hmm, 'Fighter'... I'm not really in the mood for action. Koi comedy ya rom-com chalegi?
Okay, okay. What about 'Crew'? It's a comedy with Tabu, Kareena, and Kriti. Reviews are decent.
Ooh, 'Crew' sounds perfect! I love those actresses. Chal, 'Crew' final?
Done! 'Crew' it is. I'll book the tickets. Get ready for some laughs, baby!
Okay, Holi night ke liye rangoli ka design final hai? Aur lighting kaisi rahegi?
Haan, design toh done hai! Lighting mein, fairy lights aur kuch diyas lagayenge, thoda traditional touch rahega.
Perfect! Fairy lights are a good idea. Aur rangoli ke colors? Bright and vibrant, right?
Of course! Red, yellow, green, blue... Holi hai toh colors toh bhar bhar ke honge!
Great! I'll get the colors then. Aur music ka kya plan hai? Bollywood Holi songs?
Definitely! Thoda retro, thoda new... sab mix karenge! It's gonna be epic!
Beta's PTM is coming up. I need to prep. Kya questions poochun?
Focus on their learning style and any challenges they're facing. Aur homework completion?
Good point! I'll ask about their engagement in class too. Is he participating enough?
Definitely. Also, ask about their social interactions. Are they getting along with classmates?
Right, social skills are important. I'll make a note of that. Aur kuch?
Maybe discuss extracurricular activities and how they balance studies with hobbies. All the best!
Hey! Coffee date ka plan hai, but usual cafe nahi. What about a bookstore cafe?
Bookstore cafe? That sounds interesting! Kahan par?
I was thinking 'The Bookworm's Nook'. Heard it's super cozy, with great coffee and books, obviously!
Perfect! I love the sound of that. When are we going?
How about this Saturday afternoon? We can browse, grab coffee, and maybe even find a new read.
Done! Saturday it is. I'm already excited for our coffee-and-book date!
Hey! Have you read 'The Midnight Library'? It's mind-blowing, yaar!
Oh, I've heard of it! What did you like about it so much?
The concept of exploring different life paths is just so relatable, right? It really made me think, 'What if?'
That sounds deep! I'm currently hooked on 'Project Hail Mary'. Sci-fi, but surprisingly heartwarming.
Sci-fi, huh? I'm not usually into that, but 'heartwarming' has me intrigued. What's the gist?
It's about a guy who has to save the world, but he's got amnesia. The science is cool, but the friendship is what got me.
Yaar, Jaipur ka monsoon is a total drama queen! Kabhi dhoop, kabhi baarish. Make up your mind, weather!
Haha, true that! Kal toh I was sweating like crazy, aaj sweater nikalna pada.
Exactly! It's like the weather is playing 'guess who' with us. Should I carry an umbrella or sunscreen?
Best to carry both, bhai! You never know what Jaipur's monsoon will throw at you next.
Sahi mein! Maybe I should start a weather forecasting business based on my mood swings. More accurate, I bet!
Dude, you might be onto something! 'Amit's Mood Weather' – I'd subscribe!
Guys, road trip ka plan toh bana liya, but kahaan chalein? Any suggestions?
Yaar, Goa is always a classic! Beaches, parties, the works. What do you think?
Goa is great, but let's try something different. Maybe Rajasthan? Forts, palaces, culture...
Rajasthan sounds good! But it'll be hot. How about something cooler, like Himachal?
Himachal is a good option too! Let's put it to a vote. Rajasthan or Himachal?
Okay, let's do it! Himachal it is! Now, dates and itinerary, boss!
Yaar, so many movies released recently! Have you seen anything good?
I saw 'Jawan'. SRK is back in action! What about you?
Oh, I've heard it's amazing! I was thinking of watching 'OMG 2'. Akshay Kumar, you know?
Hmm, heard mixed reviews. 'Gadar 2' is also doing well, if you're into that kinda thing.
Nah, not really my vibe. Maybe I'll check out 'Dream Girl 2'. It looks funny, yaar.
Okay, let me know how it is! I'm always looking for something new to watch.
Hey! Movie night next week? Kya dekhein? I'm open to suggestions.
Hmm, I'm also up for anything. Maybe something light and fun? Or a thriller?
Thriller sounds good! 'Andhadhun' dekhi hai? It's a classic, suspenseful and funny.
I've heard of it, but haven't seen it yet! Okay, 'Andhadhun' it is. Good choice!
Perfect! I'll get the snacks ready. Popcorn and maybe some samosas?
Samosas sound amazing! Deal. I'm already looking forward to it!
OMG, you HAVE to read 'The Silent Patient'! The twist at the end, yaar, blew my mind!
Oh really? I've heard about it. What's so shocking? Don't spoil too much!
Okay, okay, no spoilers! Just know that the silent patient isn't who you think they are. It's a total ulta-pulta!
Acha? Now I'm intrigued! Is it a fast-paced read? I need something for my commute.
Totally! I finished it in like, two days. Every chapter ends on a cliffhanger. Full paisa vasool!
Perfect! I'm adding it to my list right now. Thanks for the recommendation, Isha!
Hey! Ganesh Chaturthi is almost here! Kya pehnogi? Aur gifts ka kya plan hai?
Haan, I'm thinking a traditional saree. Gifts mein maybe dry fruits ka hamper? Tumhara kya scene hai?
Saree is a good idea! I was thinking maybe an Anarkali. Gifts mein I'm thinking silver idols.
Silver idols are lovely! Thoda expensive ho jayega, but worth it. Aur decoration ka kya plan hai?
Decoration toh simple rakhungi, flowers and lights. Maybe a small rangoli. Tum?
Same here, simple and elegant. Let's hope Bappa blesses us all! Happy planning!
Hey! Christmas ke liye kya plan hai? Aur kya pehnoge?
Hey! Ghar pe hi celebration, maybe a red dress? Tumhara kya plan hai, Rohan?
Thinking of a sweater and jeans. Gift ideas kuch? I'm blank.
Hmm, maybe a nice watch or a personalized gift? What about you?
Good idea! I was thinking of gifting a gadget. Koi specific suggestion?
Maybe wireless earbuds or a smart home device? Depends on their interests!
Beta, college applications are around the corner! Have you thought about what you want to major in? Koi idea hai?
Mom, I'm still confused! Everyone's pushing me towards engineering or medicine, but I don't know if that's really me.
Sweetheart, those are great options, but it's your life. What subjects do you genuinely enjoy? What makes you excited to learn?
I really love history and writing. Maybe something in the humanities? But will that get me a job?
There are tons of opportunities with a humanities degree! Think journalism, law, teaching, even marketing. Let's research some options together, okay?
Okay, Mom. That sounds good. Thanks for not just pushing me into STEM like everyone else!
Kal subah market chalte hain, fresh veggies aur fruits lane hain. Kya kya chahiye tujhe?
Haan, definitely! Mujhe tomatoes, onions, aur maybe kuch exotic fruits bhi dekhna hai.
Okay, tomatoes, onions done. Exotic fruits mein kya plan hai? Dragon fruit ya kuch aur?
Dragon fruit sounds good! Aur agar achha mila toh, maybe avocados bhi le lenge.
Perfect! Avocados bhi add kar leti hoon. Aur kuch spices bhi check kar lenge, khatam ho rahe hain.
Haan, spices bhi dekh lena. Jeera aur dhaniya powder toh pakka chahiye hoga.
Dude, did you read about the new AI chip? Crazy stuff, right?
Yeah, I saw something about it. What's so special?
Apparently, it's gonna revolutionize mobile gaming. Think better graphics, faster processing. Mast hai na?
Sounds cool, but I'm always skeptical. Remember all the metaverse hype? Kahan hai woh?
True, true. But this feels different. Real-world applications, you know? Plus, the article mentioned potential for medical tech too.
Okay, that's interesting. Maybe this AI chip thing is actually worth paying attention to. Let's see what happens!
Guys, did you catch the latest 'Succession' episode? Mind-blowing, right? Kya twist tha!
Dude, tell me about it! I was on the edge of my seat. Shiv's move was totally unexpected.
Exactly! And Kendall's reaction? Pure gold. I felt so bad for him, phir bhi... he's messed up.
True that. But Roman's one-liners were on point as usual. He's the comic relief we all need.
Totally! But seriously, what do you think will happen next? Is Waystar RoyCo doomed, ya phir...?
Honestly, kuch bhi ho sakta hai. That's what makes the show so addictive, right? Can't wait for next week!
Eid aa rahi hai, guys! Socho kya decorations karein is baar? Aur mithai kya banayein?
Haan, Deepak! Decorations mein toh lights zaroor honi chahiye. Aur mithai mein sheer khurma toh must hai!
Lights toh pakka! Aur sheer khurma bhi done. Aur kya add karein? Koi special sweets?
Maybe some phirni? Everyone loves phirni, right? Aur decorations mein, maybe some paper lanterns?
Phirni is a great idea! Paper lanterns bhi cool lagenge. Okay, lights, lanterns, sheer khurma, phirni... aur kuch?
Bas, itna kaafi hai! Let's focus on making these perfect. Aur distribution ka kya plan hai?
Okay, so I'm thinking a surprise party for Neha! What do you think, should we do it?
That's a great idea! She'd love that. Where should we have it?
Hmm, maybe her favorite rooftop restaurant? Ya phir, should we do it at home, more intimate?
Rooftop sounds fancy! But home would be easier to keep secret. Ghar pe hi karte hain, what do you say?
Perfect! Now, the guest list. Just close friends and family, right? Aur cake kaun layega?
Yeah, just the inner circle. I can handle the cake! Chocolate, right? And I'll handle decorations too.
Guys, woh 'Mirzapur' ka naya episode dekha? Kya ending thi, yaar! Mind-blowing!
Haan bhai! Guddu bhaiya ne toh kamaal kar diya. But Munna was too predictable, right?
Predictable? Maybe. But Divyenndu Sharmaa nailed the role, man! His dialogues were epic.
True that! But I felt Beena's character arc was a bit rushed. Kya bolte ho?
Yeah, thoda toh tha. But overall, the season was a solid 8/10 for me. What about you guys?
I'd give it a 7.5. Storyline was good, but some scenes felt stretched unnecessarily.
Dude, suna kya? Rohan got promoted to VP! Kya bolti public?
Seriously? VP? That's huge! I thought he was still a manager. Good for him!
Haan yaar, overnight success lag raha hai. Must be those late-night coding sessions, hai na?
Ya maybe he just knows the right people, you know? Politics bhi chalti hai.
True that! But still, good for him. Party toh banti hai, kya kehta hai?
Definitely! Let's plan something next weekend. I'll text the group.
Baby, I'm thinking of a surprise weekend getaway. Kya kehte ho?
A weekend getaway? That sounds amazing! Where are you thinking of going?
I was thinking maybe Udaipur? Romantic bhi hai, and we haven't been there. What do you think, jaan?
Udaipur sounds perfect! I've always wanted to go. When were you planning on going?
Next weekend? I'll handle the bookings, flights, everything. Bas tum apna schedule clear rakhna, okay?
Done! I'm so excited! Thank you, Kavya, this is the best surprise ever!
Okay guys, Navratri is almost here! Rangoli ka design final hua? Aur lighting kaisi rahegi?
Haan Aisha, rangoli toh almost done hai. Mom ne design decide kar liya. Lighting mein fairy lights lagayenge, kya kehti ho?
Fairy lights are cute, but let's add some diyas too! Thoda traditional touch bhi hona chahiye, right?
Good idea! Aur rangoli mein colors? Bright colors use karein ya pastel?
Definitely bright colors! Navratri is all about vibrancy. Red, yellow, green...the works! Kya bolte ho?
Perfect! Chalo, phir sab saman nikalte hain aur shuru karte hain. Navratri ki tayari ho jaye!
Yaar, rooftop restaurant date hai. What should I wear? I'm so confused!
Something breezy and stylish! Maybe a flowy dress or a cute top with high-waisted pants?
Hmm, dress sounds good. But which one? I have that floral one, or the black midi…
Black midi is always a safe bet! Classy and chic. Add some statement earrings.
Okay, black midi it is! Heels ya flats? I don't wanna be taller than him, lol.
Flats, definitely! Cute sandals or even stylish sneakers would work. Have fun!
Okay family, Holi aa rahi hai! Decorations aur sweets ka kya plan hai?
Rangoli toh main banaungi, Deepak! Aur sweets mein gujiya toh banni hi chahiye.
Gujiya toh pakka! Aur rang ka kya? Organic rang hi use karenge na?
Haan, organic hi best hai. Skin ke liye bhi safe rahega. Aur decorations?
Decorations mein lights lagate hain, aur flowers se bhi decorate karenge. Kya kehte ho?
Perfect! Lights aur flowers dono mast lagenge. Chalo, kaam shuru karte hain!
Hey! Did you read that article about AI taking over jobs? Mujhe toh darr lag raha hai!
Haan yaar, I saw it. Thoda scary toh hai, but I think it's also overhyped. We'll adapt.
Adapt toh karna padega, but what about the people who can't? Unka kya hoga? It's a big concern.
True, government needs to step in with retraining programs. Skills upgrade karna important hai.
Exactly! Aur yeh tech companies bhi kuch karein. They should invest in the community, right?
Totally agree. It's their responsibility to ensure a smooth transition. Let's hope they listen!
Yaar, Rakhi brings back so many memories! Mujhe yaad hai, humesha naye kapde pehente the.
Aww, that's sweet! Main bhi. What else do you remember?
Aur bhai se zaroor ladai hoti thi, kaunsi chocolate milegi uske liye! It was all in good fun though.
Haha, sibling rivalry toh must hai! Did you make your own rakhis ever?
Kabhi kabhi! Mostly, mummy banati thi. But the best part was the delicious food, especially kheer!
Kheer sounds amazing! Rakhi is all about family, food, and fun, right?
Yaar, Kolkata ka commute! It's a total mess, especially during rush hour. Auto milna bhi mushkil hai.
Haan, I can imagine! How long does it usually take you to reach school?
At least an hour, sometimes more if there's a jam near Gariahat. Metro is better, but it's always packed like sardines.
True that! Metro toh lifeline hai, but subah shaam jung ka maidan ban jaata hai.
Exactly! Aur woh flyover construction... it's making everything worse. Kab khatam hoga, bhagwan jaane!
Seriously! I heard it's delayed again. Well, at least you have some good street food to look forward to after a long day!
Hey! Christmas night ke liye rangoli aur lighting ka kya plan hai? Koi ideas?
Hi! Rangoli mein to Santa aur stars bana sakte hain. Lighting mein fairy lights kaise rahengi?
Santa aur stars awesome idea hai! Fairy lights bhi perfect. Aur kuch colorful lights bhi add karein?
Haan, colorful lights se aur festive lagega! Rangoli ke colors decide kar liye?
Red, green, white aur gold use karenge. Thoda traditional, thoda modern. Kya kehti ho?
Perfect combination! Let's get all the stuff tomorrow then? Super excited!
Kal Ganesh Chaturthi hai! Rangoli ka kya plan hai? Aur lighting kaisi karein?
Rangoli toh main kar dungi, Sneha. Lighting mein, why not use those fairy lights?
Fairy lights toh hain, but kuch aur creative? Maybe diyas bhi laga dein?
Haan, diyas are a good idea! Aur rangoli mein Ganesh ji ka design?
Perfect! Ganesh ji ka design aur bright colours. Lighting mein diyas and fairy lights, done!
Awesome! Sounds like a plan. Kal sab milke karenge, phir toh mazaa aayega!
Yaar, I was thinking we should plan some healthy meals for the week. Kya kehte ho?
Haan, that's a good idea! I'm tired of ordering takeout all the time. Any ideas?
Maybe some dal-chawal, sabzi, and roti? Simple but nutritious. Or we could try some quinoa bowls?
Quinoa bowls sound interesting! And definitely more veggies. Let's add some fruits too.
Perfect! I'll make a list. We can go grocery shopping tomorrow. No more junk food, okay?
Deal! Healthy eating it is. I'm actually looking forward to this. Thanks, Aarav!
Aur batao, weekend ka kya plan hai? Any music gigs?
Nahin yaar, this weekend is chill. Thinking of catching a movie. Tumhara kya scene hai?
Main bhi soch raha hoon kuch relax karoon. Maybe jam with friends, you know, casual.
Sounds good! Koi naya tune bana rahe ho kya?
Haan, thoda bahut chal raha hai. Let's see if it shapes up this weekend. Chai kaisi hai?
Chai toh mast hai! Perfect for planning a chill weekend. Enjoy your jam session, Dev!
Yaar, I still think Blue Tokai has the best coffee in Delhi. Fight me!
Nahin, bhai! Sardarji Refreshments in Old Delhi is the real deal. Authentic and strong!
Sardarji is good for a quick fix, but Blue Tokai's single-origin beans are next level.
Okay, okay, but have you tried Coffee Bond? Their cold brew is amazing, especially in this heat.
Coffee Bond is decent, but a bit too hipster for my taste. Blue Tokai strikes the perfect balance.
Fine, we'll agree to disagree. But next time, Sardarji's chai after coffee, deal?
Yaar, these screen-time limits are killing me! Padhai kab karu, reels kab dekhu?
I know, right? But bhai, exams are near. Thoda toh control karna padega.
Haan, that's true. I'm thinking of making a strict study schedule. What's your routine?
I study in blocks, like 2 hours study, 30 mins break. Helps me focus better.
Noted! I'll try that. Maybe I'll schedule my reel time as a reward after each block.
Perfect! Balance is key, dost. All the best for your studies!
Okay, so Goa trip? Budget kya soche ho? I was thinking around ₹15,000 each?
₹15,000 sounds good! But let's break it down. Flights ka kya scene hai?
Flights are around ₹5,000 return. Accommodation, maybe ₹3,000 for 3 nights? Cheap hotels chalega?
Haan, cheap hotels are fine. Food and activities ka kitna rakhna hai?
Food and activities, ₹5,000 should be enough, right? Thoda bargaining bhi karenge!
Perfect! And ₹2,000 for miscellaneous expenses? Sounds like a plan!
Yaar, I need to schedule a parent-teacher meeting for Rohan Jr. Kab free ho tum?
Oh, sure! What's the issue? I'm usually free after 4 PM. Batao, kaunsi date suit karegi?
Okay, great! Let's aim for next Tuesday then? 4:30 PM should work. Check kar lo tum bhi.
Tuesday works for me. Anything specific I should prepare for? Like, is it about his grades or behavior?
Thoda grades ka tension hai, and I want to understand his progress better. Bas wohi. Thanks, yaar!

Acha? Try 'I feel' statements. Instead of blaming, explain how you feel. Like, 'I feel hurt when...' Got it?
